sentences.english: Henry wins the day achieving one of the greatest battlefield reversals of all time.

sentences.english: This will give you a huge advantage and if played correctly, can allow a smaller force to beat a larger one.
sentences.chinese: 这会给您巨大得优势，如果使用正确，可以以少胜多。
